Hillary's proposals include Ban conversion therapy for minors Upgrade discharge status for LGBT vets which would restore VA coverage, benefits, etc. End the Trans ban on military service Combat LGBT youth homelessness via increased funding Cap out-of-pocket expenses for HIV/AIDS patients Expand utilization of HIV prevention including PrEP Invest in law enforcement retraining for LGBT sensitivity, in particular trans individuals Increase the US investment in the UN Global Equality Fund, which advances gender and LGBT equity abroad (which she pushed to found as SOC) These are all overlooked by Bernie's campaign. Bernie's platform for LGBT issues does not mention LGBT youth homelessness (HALF of homeless kids are LGBT), LGBT veterans dishonorably discharged under DADT, the present day ban on trans military personnel, no mention of HIV/AIDS at all, and no mention of LGBT rights abroad. Bernie was also against gay marriage in 2008 at the state level in Vermont. Today he supports it.
